data.name: I Expect You To Die 2 Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: When you can't be in the virtual spy world of I Expect You To Die 2, you can transport yourself there by listening to the cool jazz tunes from the game. The soundtrack features ten tracks that will provide you with a sumptuous listening experience. The opening credits theme song voiced by America's Got Talent alum Puddles Pity Party is sure to impress. Enjoy the music, Agents!
data.about_the_game: When you can't be in the virtual spy world of I Expect You To Die 2, you can transport yourself there by listening to the cool jazz tunes from the game. The soundtrack features ten tracks that will provide you with a sumptuous listening experience. The opening credits theme song voiced by America's Got Talent alum Puddles Pity Party is sure to impress. Enjoy the music, Agents!
data.short_description: Relax and enjoy the smooth jazz sounds of the music from I Expect You To Die 2. This soundtrack features the well-honed baritone of Puddles Pity Party as he croons the opening credit's theme song.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 54 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 298 MB available space
